description: This table maps pricing and packaging features to their respective tiers and business units.

schema.name: feature
schema.description: Name of pricing and packaging feature.

schema.name: tier
schema.description: Name of pricing and packaging feature tier.

schema.name: license_essential_tier
schema.description: TRUE if feature is accessible for essential tier license customer, otherwise FALSE.

schema.name: license_premier_tier
schema.description: TRUE if feature is accessible for premier tier license customer, otherwise FALSE.

schema.name: license_public_sector_tier
schema.description: TRUE if feature is accessible for public sector tier license customer, FALSE if inaccessible to customer but business unit has a public sector tier option, NULL for business units without a public sector tier license offering.

schema.name: license_enterprise_tier
schema.description: TRUE if feature is accessible for enterprise tier license customer, FALSE if inaccessible to customer but business unit has an enterprise tier option, NULL for business units without an enterprise tier license offering.

schema.name: license_add_on_tier
schema.description: TRUE if feature is accessible for safety add-on license customer, FALSE if inaccessible to customer but is a safety feature, NULL for non safety features.
